title: FT_PT2 Function Block
description:
INTEGRATE is a Integrator which integrates the value of X to an external
value Y. The integrator operates when E = TRUE, the internal Default of E
= TRUE.
name: FT_PT2

input.name: in
input.description: The input signal value to be processed by the function block.

input.name: T
input.description: The time duration for the integration process.

input.name: D
input.description: The damping factor used in the integration calculation.

input.name: K
input.description: The gain constant for scaling the input, with a default value of 1.0.

output.name: out
output.description: The output result after processing the input through the function block.
